description: FIGURES 20–25. Calapnita lehi sp. nov. (ZFMK, Ar 15965–66). 20–21. Left male palp, prolateral and retrolateral views (asterisk: membranous bulbal process; arrow points at short membranous process from 'knee'). 22. Procursus, dorsal view. 23. Male chelicerae, frontal view. 24–25. Cleared female genitalia, ventral and dorsal views. a, appendix; b, genital bulb; e, embolus; f, femur; p, procursus; tr, trochanter. Scale lines: 0.3 mm (23–25), 0.5 mm (20–22).
name: FIGURES 20–25 in Revision and cladistic analysis of the Southeast Asian leaf-dwelling spider genus Calapnita Simon (Araneae, Pholcidae)
